events.message: I am reporting a car accident that took place yesterday evening on Elm Street involving my vehicle and another car.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident according to the description of the collision and involved parties.
An agent has been assigned to oversee the details of your car accident claim and to guide you through the process.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim and understand the urgency due to the damage reported in the vehicle collision.
Please provide a copy of the accident report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and your driverâ€™s license to proceed.
The requested documents, including police report and vehicle damage photos, have been uploaded to your claim file.
The investigation into your car accident has begun, and our claims team is reviewing all submitted documentation carefully.
Our investigation team has completed the review and determined the liability and extent of damage in the vehicle collision.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the vehicle damage assessment and policy coverage details.
We received positive customer feedback appreciating the timely updates and clarity about the claim settlement proposal.
The claim has been officially approved for payout based on the agreed settlement amount and policy terms.
Payment for the approved claim amount has been issued directly to your bank account as per the submitted payment details.
Your auto accident claim has been successfully closed following the payment issuance and confirmation of receipt.
